Summary: a huge fire ball that changed shape rapidly i blacked out wake up with unexplanible bruises and burns
divs: Sighting DetailsI was waching t.v inside my house when i heard a anoying squekellike when irst turn on a old t.v. I ent out side with my dog rascal. I walked out to it it had the apperince of fire but i went up to touch it and it was slightly cold like steel that had been left in a freezer or in a snow storm. i than heard a very high frequncy sound that knocked me out. I woke up i my bad in my under wear as if i had gone to bed. I went to make coffe when i reached out to take the pitcher out of the coffe maker i noticed a very large purple and yellow bruise.The next day i went to see my sister who had recenty learned hypnosis. She put me under and she said i told her a tail of horror. They took sperm samples and did reprouduction expeiments on me. they also implanted a chip in my heart. here is my e-mail address if you would like to talk to me personaly:jesstheshizz@yahoo.com here also is my cell-phone # 573-247-3366
